div.p: No. 221, vol. 1862 V, VPRS 1168/P inward correspondence register, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Letter not found; item is a register entry only, of a letter dated 8 January 1862.
[Begs of the Chief Secretary that he will be good enough to reconsider his decision in regard to Mr Dallachy.]
The register indicates thatM's letter was returned to him on 10 January 1862 with a minute from the Chief Secretary, but no details are given. The matter probably concerned Dallachy's having been dismissed for drunkenness; see M to J. O'Shanassy, 14 December 1861.SeealsoDowe & Maroske (2020).
